name: Keen SOLR Sandals - Women's
description:
When you need serious traction in water, slip on these amphibious sandals and get ready to get wet. The SOLR sole has zoned siping to help it stick to the slick terrain you find in at the sea, ocean, lake and river (hence the name).Durable TPU upper with protective rubber toe cap.Webbing, made from recycled plastic bottles.Quick-lock lace system locks your foot securely in place.EVA footbed supports your arches for all-day wear.Compression-moulded EVA midsole balances comfort and cushioning.Non-marking Aquagrip rubber with siping for grip on wet and slippery surfaces.

        Sustainability
